content: Let's wait and see if there really is a policy -- on Russia, Syria, the rest of the world -- or we're in for a long series of whiplash 180s. I'd feel a lot better if the State Department was fully staffed with experts in their fields and if Tillerson had been allowed to hire Elliott Abrams as his deputy. I'd also feel a lot better if Bannon and the rest of the alt-right crew was out of the White House entirely. Then Trump could play at being president while the adults ran the country.
